remarks: Binary relation expressing the commutes relation.  Definition of commutes in [Kalmbach] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

cmbri $p |- ( A C_H B <-> A = ( ( A i^i B ) vH ( A i^i ( _|_ ` B ) ) ) ) $.
